    • About Alex Tooke


    The Peak Properties Group is a full service, Denver-based real estate team. What does full service mean? It means we’re here to guide you through the entire real estate experience, step-by-step. Whether you’re looking for homes for sale in Littleton, condos for sale in Aurora, or simply perusing the Denver real estate listings just to see what’s out there, we’re here to help.
